name: a conversation (merryh)
description:
This is a micro-game made for AccessJam 2021 exploring a conversation with ones body. It's about the facets of physicality that make up elements of chronic illness, and the ways in which you begin to understand your body not through logic, because there often is none, but through metaphor. 

Some flashing animations may prove difficult for some players.

Themes of disability, suicidal ideation.
